get.description:
Define endpoint name which will appear in the API endpoint for this content type.
For example::
    http://pulp.example.com/pulp/api/v3/content/rpm/advisories/

Also specify queryset and serializer for UpdateRecord.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Filter results where id matches value

parameters.name: id__in
parameters.description: Filter results where id is in a comma-separated list of values

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter results where status matches value

parameters.name: status__in
parameters.description: Filter results where status is in a comma-separated list of values

parameters.name: severity
parameters.description: Filter results where severity matches value

parameters.name: severity__in
parameters.description: Filter results where severity is in a comma-separated list of values

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter results where type matches value

parameters.name: type__in
parameters.description: Filter results where type is in a comma-separated list of values

parameters.name: repository_version
parameters.description: Repository Version referenced by HREF

parameters.name: repository_version_added
parameters.description: Repository Version referenced by HREF

parameters.name: repository_version_removed
parameters.description: Repository Version referenced by HREF

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A list of fields to include in the response.

post.description: Trigger an asynchronous task to create content,optionally create new repository version.

post.description: Trigger an asynchronous task to copy RPM contentfrom one repository into another, creating a newrepository version.

parameters.name: source_repo
parameters.description: A URI of the repository.

parameters.name: source_repo_version
parameters.description: A URI of the repository version

parameters.name: dest_repo
parameters.description: A URI of the repository.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: A list of types to copy ["package", "advisory"]

id.title: Id
id.description: Update id (short update name, e.g. RHEA-2013:1777)

updated_date.title: Updated date
updated_date.description: Date when the update was updated (e.g. '2013-12-02 00:00:00')

issued_date.title: Issued date
issued_date.description: Date when the update was issued (e.g. '2013-12-02 00:00:00')

version.title: Version
version.description: Update version (probably always an integer number)

artifact.title: Artifact
artifact.description: Artifact file representing the physical content

relative_path.title: Relative path
relative_path.description: Path where the artifact is located relative to distributions base_path

file.title: File
file.description: An uploaded file that should be turned into the artifact of the content unit.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of a repository the new content unit should be associated with.

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the package. For example, '2.8.0'

release.title: Release
release.description: The release of a particular version of the package. e.g. '1.el7' or '3.f24'

arch.title: Arch
arch.description: The target architecture for a package.For example, 'x86_64', 'i686', or 'noarch'

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Short description of the packaged software

description.title: Description
description.description: In-depth description of the packaged software

url.title: Url
url.description: URL with more information about the packaged software

location_href.title: Location href
location_href.description: Relative location of package to the repodata

rpm_buildhost.title: Rpm buildhost
rpm_buildhost.description: Hostname of the system that built the package

rpm_license.title: Rpm license
rpm_license.description: License term applicable to the package software (GPLv2, etc.)

rpm_packager.title: Rpm packager
rpm_packager.description: Person or persons responsible for creating the package

rpm_sourcerpm.title: Rpm sourcerpm
rpm_sourcerpm.description: Name of the source package (srpm) the package was built from

rpm_vendor.title: Rpm vendor
rpm_vendor.description: Name of the organization that produced the package

is_modular.title: Is modular
is_modular.description: Flag to identify if the package is modular

size_archive.title: Size archive
size_archive.description: Size, in bytes, of the archive portion of the original package file

size_installed.title: Size installed
size_installed.description: Total size, in bytes, of every file installed by this package

size_package.title: Size package
size_package.description: Size, in bytes, of the package

time_build.title: Time build
time_build.description: Time the package was built in seconds since the epoch

time_file.title: Time file
time_file.description: The 'file' time attribute in the primary XML - file mtime in seconds since the epoch.

packages.title: Packages
packages.description: Relative path to directory with binary RPMs.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of the repository containing the content for this Addon.

size.title: Size
size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

md5.title: Md5
md5.description: The MD5 checksum of the file if available.

sha1.title: Sha1
sha1.description: The SHA-1 checksum of the file if available.

sha224.title: Sha224
sha224.description: The SHA-224 checksum of the file if available.

sha256.title: Sha256
sha256.description: The SHA-256 checksum of the file if available.

sha384.title: Sha384
sha384.description: The SHA-384 checksum of the file if available.

sha512.title: Sha512
sha512.description: The SHA-512 checksum of the file if available.

packages.title: Packages
packages.description: Relative path to directory with binary RPMs.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of the repository containing the content for this Variant.

source_packages.title: Source packages
source_packages.description: Relative path to directory with source RPMs.

source_repository.title: Source repository
source_repository.description: Relative path to YUM repository with source RPMs.

debug_packages.title: Debug packages
debug_packages.description: Relative path to directory with debug RPMs.

debug_repository.title: Debug repository
debug_repository.description: Relative path to YUM repository with debug RPMs.

identity.title: Identity
identity.description: Relative path to a pem file that identifies a product.

release_is_layered.title: Release is layered
release_is_layered.description: Typically False for an operating system, True otherwise.

mainimage.title: Mainimage
mainimage.description: Relative path to Anaconda stage2 image.

totaldiscs.title: Totaldiscs
totaldiscs.description: Number of discs in media set.

base_path.title: Base path
base_path.description: The base (relative) path component of the published url. Avoid paths that                     overlap with other distribution base paths (e.g. "foo" and "foo/bar")

base_url.title: Base url
base_url.description: The URL for accessing the publication as defined by this distribution.

artifact.title: Artifact
artifact.description: Artifact file representing the physical content

relative_path.title: Relative path
relative_path.description: Path where the artifact is located relative to distributions base_path

file.title: File
file.description: An uploaded file that should be turned into the artifact of the content unit.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of a repository the new content unit should be associated with.

artifact.title: Artifact
artifact.description: Artifact file representing the physical content

relative_path.title: Relative path
relative_path.description: Path where the artifact is located relative to distributions base_path

file.title: File
file.description: An uploaded file that should be turned into the artifact of the content unit.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of a repository the new content unit should be associated with.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of the repository to be published.

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for this remote.

url.title: Url
url.description: The URL of an external content source.

ssl_ca_certificate.title: Ssl ca certificate
ssl_ca_certificate.description: A string containing the PEM encoded CA certificate used to validate the server certificate presented by the remote server. All new line characters must be escaped. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

ssl_client_certificate.title: Ssl client certificate
ssl_client_certificate.description: A string containing the PEM encoded client certificate used for authentication. All new line characters must be escaped. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

ssl_client_key.title: Ssl client key
ssl_client_key.description: A PEM encoded private key used for authentication. Returns SHA256 sum on GET.

ssl_validation.title: Ssl validation
ssl_validation.description: If True, SSL peer validation must be performed.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username to be used for authentication when syncing.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password to be used for authentication when syncing.

_last_updated.title: last updated
_last_updated.description: Timestamp of the most recent update of the remote.

policy.title: Policy
policy.description: The policy to use when downloading content. The possible values include: 'immediate', 'on_demand', and 'streamed'. 'immediate' is the default.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of the repository to be synchronized.

mirror.title: Mirror
mirror.description: If ``True``, synchronization will remove all content that is not present in the remote repository. If ``False``, sync will be additive only.

artifact.title: Artifact
artifact.description: Artifact file representing the physical content

relative_path.title: Relative path
relative_path.description: Path where the artifact is located relative to distributions base_path

file.title: File
file.description: An uploaded file that should be turned into the artifact of the content unit.

repository.title: Repository
repository.description: A URI of a repository the new content unit should be associated with.
